timeline.author: tylerbenson

timeline.bodyText: Do you think it would simplify things to reduce the distinction between tags and global tags and combine them into a single map as soon as possible?  (End result being just a single tags field.)
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText:
+1 I think this idea makes sense too. We just need to be careful about the order of precedence for updating the single map.
E.g.,

Look for DD_ prefixed env var first for env/service/version.
Then look at JMX flags.
replies.author: jdgumz

timeline.message: DD_SERVICE priority over DD_SERVICE_NAME; merge TAGS and GLOBAL_TAGS
